item.name: read_out_protection
item.caption: Read Out Protection
item.descript: Read protection option byte. The read protection is used to protect the software code stored in Flash memory

item.name: rdp
item.caption: RDP
item.descript: This read protection helps the user protect the software code stored in flash memory.

item.name: nRST_STOP
item.caption: nRST_STOP
item.descript: Enable :Reset generated when entering Stop mode\nDisable:No reset generated

item.name: nRST_STDBY
item.caption: nRST_STDBY
item.descript: Enable :Reset generated when entering Standby mode\nDisable:No reset generated

item.name: Page0-Page3
item.caption: Page0-Page3
item.descript: Enable :Write protection active on this sector\nDisable:Write protection not active on this sector
